ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It does not befit them and they are not capable of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They are not worthy of it, nor have they power.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: nor does it behove them, nor does it lie in their power.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: they are not supposed to do so. Nor do have they the ability for such a task.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They are unworthy of it, nor can they do it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Neither would it suit them nor are they able.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And it behoves them not, and they have not the power to do (it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: it behoves them not, neither are they able.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It is not meet for them, nor is it in their power,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: neither are they worthy of it, nor are they capable of it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It behoveth them not, nor they can.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Neither does it behoove them, nor are they capable [of doing that].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It would neither suit them nor would they be able (to produce it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Neither would it suit them, nor they can (produce it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: it is not for them, nor are they able.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is not in their interests, nor in their power.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It is not allowable for them, nor would they be able.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:211] Neither would it behove, befit, them, to bring it down, nor are they capable, [of doing] that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (It is not meet for them) the devils are not fit to do so, (nor is it in their power) nor could they do this,
